languages.text: {n}Аугменты на челе сервитора изрыгают сноп искр, и из пустых глазниц выкатываются несколько черных, окрашенных пеплом слез.{/n} "Готов... служить..."
{n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."
languages.original_text: {n}Аугменты на челе сервитора изрыгают сноп искр, и из пустых глазниц выкатываются несколько черных, окрашенных пеплом слез.{/n} "Готов... служить..."

{n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

languages.text: {n}Ein Funkenschauer schießt aus der Augmentationen auf dem Kopf des Servitors, und schwarze, von Asche durchzogene Tränen fließen aus seinen leeren Augenhöhlen.{/n} "Bereit ... zu dienen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Funkenschauer schießt aus der Augmentationen auf dem Kopf des Servitors, und schwarze, von Asche durchzogene Tränen fließen aus seinen leeren Augenhöhlen.{/n} "Bereit ... zu dienen ..."

languages.text: {n}Une pluie d'étincelles jaillit des augmétiques sur le front du servitor et des larmes noires, couleur de cendres, se mettent à couler de ses orbites vides.{/n} « Je suis prêt... à servir... »
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une pluie d'étincelles jaillit des augmétiques sur le front du servitor et des larmes noires, couleur de cendres, se mettent à couler de ses orbites vides.{/n} « Je suis prêt... à servir... »

languages.text: {n}一串火花从机仆头上的植入物迸射出来，它空洞的眼窝里流下了几滴灰黑色的泪滴。{/n}“准备……服务……”
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}一串火花从奴工头上的植入物迸射出来，它空洞的眼窝里流下了几滴灰黑色的泪滴。{/n}“准备……服务……”

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの額のオーグメティックから火花がシャワーのように散って、空っぽの瞳のソケットから黒く灰混じりの涙がポロポロと流れる。{/n}「奉仕…準備完了…」
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの額のオーグメティックから火花がシャワーのように散って、空っぽの瞳のソケットから黒く灰混じりの涙がポロポロと流れる。{/n}「奉仕…準備完了…」

languages.text: {n}Una lluvia de chispas brota de los auméticos de la frente del servidor, y varias lágrimas negras teñidas de ceniza brotan de las cuencas vacías de sus ojos.{/n} «Listo... para servir...».
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una lluvia de chispas brota de los auméticos de la frente del servidor, y varias lágrimas negras teñidas de ceniza brotan de las cuencas vacías de sus ojos.{/n} «Listo... para servir...»

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün alnındaki ogmetikten kıvılcımlar saçılıyor. İçi boş göz oyuklarından kül tonunda, kararmış birkaç damla gözyaşı usulca süzülüyor.{/n} "Emrinize... Amadeyim..."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the augmetics on the servitor's brow, and several black, ash-tinted tears run from its empty eye sockets.{/n} "Ready... to serve..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitörün kaşındaki ogmetikten kıvılcımlar saçılıyor. İçi boş göz oyuklarından birkaç damla siyah ve kül rengi gözyaşı, usulca süzülüyor.{/n} "Emrinize amadeyim..."
